Brandon.about: Hey! I'm Brandon Somoza, a third year CS major at NYU and I'm excited to be a fellow for the summer! I first got into programming my second year of high school, and since then I have not looked back. I coded a couple of basic games like pong and a card memory game over that summer and really found myself enjoying the process to the fullest!

work experience.title: Construction assistant
work experience.description: Assisted in several tasks such as cutting tiles and machines. Also, I put tile on several walls in the basement and in the bathroom. Cut my hand once, it was pretty gnarly but no scars luckily!

work experience.title: Cashier/Server
work experience.description: Did a A LOT of stuff. Took care of costumers, even helped out in the back and cooked a couple of times, since it's my family's place I was willing to do everything and still am

hobbies.title: Soccer
hobbies.description: I love everything to do with soccer. Playing it, watching it, reading about it, playing fifa, it is by far my favorite sport

hobbies.title: Formula 1
hobbies.description: I also enjoy watching formula 1. I used to find motor-racing boring (they go in circles for 50 laps how boring!) until I watched the Netflix series Drive to Survive. It helped me realize how much technique and finesse the sport requires.
